description: ruins of castle at right and center on bluff; cows, dog and figures, LLC and LRC; seated figure and standing figure in front of archway at right edge
inscription:
Title, Date and Inscription

LRC at bottom edge, in pencil: [No 28 du Catalogue et 61 (?) de Goubert  Avant la lettre et les armex. (?)]
provenance: [James A. Bergquist, Newton Centre, Mass., until 2007; sold in August for KTO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2007-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC at bottom edge, in pencil: [Vue de Capo di Bove.]; LRC, in the plate: [1780]
title: Vue du Tombeau de Cecilia Metella à Capo di Bove
